Summary: its like a boomerang fly over me.. i was sleeping in the terrace and it was passing below the clouds. no sound.. nothing.. it passed silently
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in chennai

divs: sighting detailson 6\15\2012 i was sleeping over the terrace.. around 8.40pm a boomerang shaped object passed in a high speed.. it was grey in color.. no sound. no lights. it lost in the sky...
